name: Runners On Stream
description:
Runners on Stream is a Twitch.tv overlay minigame for streamers. The runners are emotes taken from Twitch, FrankerFaceZ, BetterTTV and subscriber emotes.

Host your own race and engage with your viewers, let them guess the winner of the round through the chat! Get ready for a hilariously chaotic time!

Runners on Stream can be perfectly played in the background while afk, as the game runs on an autoloop: guess, run, win! Play it while on breaks, on intro screens etc. as a means to entertain your viewers while away or play it actively, for raffles for example.


🛠 How it works

When a round starts, the runners will spawn on the track. Every runner represents a randomly picked Emote from Twitch, FrankerFaceZ, BetterTTV and your channel. Now anyone in your channel's chat can place a guess with "!lanenumber" or with the emote itself. The overall guesses are displayed on the track. After the guessing phase the runners will start to run and compete against each other. The winner will be displayed after the finish line is reached.

📽 OBS Overlay guide

The black background of the game is transparent. To make it appear transparent in your stream, apply the following in OBS Studio:

  1. Add a new "Game Capture" source
  2. Select the newly created source -> right click -> properties.
  3. Set the following:
    1. Mode: Capture specific window
    2. Window: [RunnersOnStream.exe]: RunnersOnStream
    3. Check "Allow Transparency"
    4. Complete by pressing "Ok"
